question: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your house/ flat.Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letterexplain the reasons for the noiseapologisedescribe what action you will takeYou should write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing this letter about the complaint I have received from you. My name is Keith and we have recently shifted to  London as my husband got transferred before we stayed in America.

Let me explain my situation in detail,  the noise is due to  renovations which are being done to the flat, the carpentry work is a long process. The ceiling is not proper and we are changing the floor tiles as they are not compatible with the furniture. I am really sorry to bother you. My children are making noise while playing, earlier we lived in a placed where we had a playground. So, they are unfamiliar with this kind of environment.

I would take action accordingly and tell carpenters to make less sound while doing the work and ask children to stay calm while playing. I hope you could visit sometime. I would love to know  you more.
I look forward to seeing you.
